short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to build a better democracy. Truth Matters

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A tool to block all influence of the insidious Murdoch Media Empire.

Their extreme right wing propoganda is damaging our democracy and we need to fight back.

Feel free to install this extensions on computers of people who need help with their right wing vierws. Ideas could include your parents, uncle, cousins, room mate, work colleague or maybe even an executive at News Corp. 
***With permission of course***

The possibilities to improve our democracy are endless.

Murdoch is the poison. Removing his revenue stream is the cure.

-----------------------------------
New Features: Fake News Warning for non-Murdoch sites.
